name: Ink drops
description: Circles have random allocation and radiuses on canvas, appearing with oscillation effect. The code is inspired by Vera Moln√©r works and art of Yayoi Kusama.

name: Dots Hallucinations Part 1
description: The variation of ink drops. Animation of circles moving and changing size on canvas based on speed and variation.

name: Dots Hallucinations Part 2
description: The variation of ink drops. The animation of circles moving and changing size on a canvas, and additional mini dots deriving from each circle.

name: Dots Particles
description: In this code the system of particles, which have random radius, velocity, hue and lifespan frames, moving around the canvas. Particles and velocity frames are intended to provide a calm atmosphere.

name: Moon Pattern
description: The moon is inspired by Marine Serre's futuristic and avant-garde style'. An array of circles and moons, with a function that resets the timer and recreates circles and moons. In addition, randomly colored dots moving all over the canvas.

name: Moon Arcs
description: The moon is inspired by Marine Serre's futuristic and avant-garde style'. Perlin noise is used to show randomness in the position of moon shapes. Small, white ellipses are drawn to give a sense of sparkle.

name: Japanese Vase
description: The code is inspired by japanese ceramics aesthetic. A pattern of radial lines which derive from the center point of canvas, with a color gradient that changes based on the angle of line.

name: Eastern Shell
description: The interactive spiral pattern resembles tiny shell, that responds to mouse hovering. Perlin noise adds randomness to the lines positions and color changes based on the angle of line

name: Universe System Part 1
description: A pattern of animated circles with color and size variation that flowing in the canvas based on Perlin noise aesthetics.

name: Universe System Part 2
description: The pattern of circles, trinagles and squares that moves and change sizes and color based on Perlin noise.
